channel.title: Guilhermo von Scharten Heldt
channel.description: Recent content on Guilhermo von Scharten Heldt

item.title: My Smooshy Mushy
item.description: Studio WarDucks Media Gameplay Video Personal contribution Development Technologies Unity Platforms Android iOS Description Make your Smooshy Mushy come to life in this interactive fun mobile game. Feed them yummy foods in the kitchen. Make sure they get enough sleep by tucking them into bed. Play lots of mini-games to make them happy. Don’t forget about their Besties. You can do this by playing games with your Smooshy and Bestie at Smooshy Mushy Industries Food Factory!

item.title: RollerCoaster Legends II
item.description: Studio WarDucks Media Gameplay Video Personal contribution Development Technologies Unity Platforms PS4 VR Oculus Vive HTC Vive Description RollerCoaster Legends, the top-selling RollerCoaster on PlayStation VR is back, but this time you will be whisked away on an adventure through Norse mythology! RollerCoaster Legends II: Thor’s Hammer transports you to the mythical land of Loki and Thor. Travel to Asgard on the rainbow Bifröst before flying through the home of the Elves in Alfheim.

item.title: RollerCoaster Legends
item.description: Studio WarDucks Media Gameplay Video Personal contribution Development Technologies Unity Platforms PS4 VR Oculus Vive HTC Vive Description Transport yourself to the land of Greek mythology on a RollerCoaster ride you’ll never forget. Speed off on an eight-minute rollercoaster journey only possible in virtual reality. Visit the Temple of Poseidon, the River Styx, Tartarus, and the Palace of Hades, by zipping up and down daring drops and twists while sitting on your couch.

item.title: Sneaky Bears
item.description: Studio WarDucks Media Gameplay Video Review 1 Review 2 Review 3 Personal contribution Development Design (-) Technologies Unity Platforms PS4 VR Oculus Vive HTC Vive Oculus Gear VR VR Cardboard Description The world is under attack…by evil teddy bears. Led by the evil mastermind bear Frank, they have seized control of a toy factory in which they are building an evil teddy bear army to take over the world.

item.title: Sneaky Bears RollerCoaster VR
item.description: Studio WarDucks Media Gameplay Video Personal contribution Development Technologies Unity Platforms Oculus Gear VR VR Cardboard Description Ever wanted to try a DOUBLE LOOP on a Roller Coaster, but have been too afraid to try? Now you can…while sitting in your living room! With three crazy journeys, each at a different intensity level, you can try out the coaster through the fantastical Sneaky Bears toy factory.

item.title: Global Agents
item.description: Studio WarDucks Media Gameplay Video Personal contribution Development Design (-) Technologies Flash (AS3) Starling Platforms Web (Facebook) Android iOS Description Travel the world working as part of the Counter Terrorism Agency in this hidden object game.

item.title: Blockage 2
item.description: Studio Independent Personal contribution Development Design Technologies Flash (AS3) Platforms Web Flash isn’t available in browsers anymore, so if you want you can download the game here and then run it with Flash Player Projector (about). Description The sequel to one of the greatest brain-melting puzzle platform games! In this game you have to beat 30 brain-melting stages by controlling colored squares that need to be carefully positioned in order to fill color gaps.

item.title: Blockage
item.description: Studio Independent Personal contribution Development Design Technologies Flash (AS3) Platforms Web Flash isn’t available in browsers anymore, so if you want you can download the game here and then run it with Flash Player Projector (about). Description Beat 20 brain-melting stages in this puzzle platform game! In this game you have to control colored squares that need to be carefully positioned in order to fill color gaps.

item.title: gibeCOWpls!
item.description: Studio Independent Personal contribution Producing Design (-) Development (-) Technologies Unity (C#) Platforms Android iOS Description Challenge your friends in this amazing skill game with a psychedelic mood. Fly your cow through as many popsicle barriers as possible and compare your performance with all your friends. This is not for the faint of the heart. Although your cow may be cute, its gruesome death will be inevitable.

item.title: Space Draw
item.description: Studio Origami Media (co-founder) Personal contribution Development Design Technologies Corona SDK (Lua) Platforms Android iOS Description Space Draw is a fun game set in space. It all happens very fast: you’re in space, you’re an astronaut and, oops, you’re falling. You control the astronaut movement by drawing on the screen. Just remember to avoid aliens and reach for the stars It’s up to you: How far will you travel?

item.title: Splash Arena
item.description: Studio Origami Media (co-founder) Personal contribution Development Design Technologies Corona SDK (Lua) Platforms Android iOS Media Trailer Description Splash Arena is a new take on the old bubble shooting formula. Now you can challenge your friends and see who’s the baddest, meanest and fastest shooter around. You can play it in groups of 2 to 4 people on your device.

item.title: Pirate's Last Adventure
item.description: Studio Independent Personal contribution Development Design Technologies Flash (AS3) Platforms Web Flash isn’t available in browsers anymore, so if you want you can download the game here and then run it with Flash Player Projector (about). Description Sail as far as you can while you survive through storms, avoid shipwrecks and drink rum! Dodge obstacles, drink rum, pillage money from shipwrecks and survive great storms to be compared to the great pirates in history and to other players all over the internet.

item.title: Xpletter
item.description: Studio Independent Personal contribution Development Design Technologies Flash (AS3) Platforms Web Flash isn’t available in browsers anymore, so if you want you can download the game here and then run it with Flash Player Projector (about). Description Play the ultimate letter exploding experience! Type the correct letters to earn score and change game speed in this fast paced typing game. After each round, you are able to choose between increasing your number of shots or increasing your reload speed.

item.title: Kill Damn Beavers
item.description: Studio Independent Personal contribution Development Design Technologies Flash (AS3) Platforms Web Flash isn’t available in browsers anymore, so if you want you can download the game here and then run it with Flash Player Projector (about). Description Headshoot, level up and use special skills to defend your city’s dam from several attacking beavers and a giant robot boss called Beaverzord! Defend your city’s new dam by killing beavers responsibles for the descruction of the previous.

item.title: BioBalancer
item.description: Studio Independent Personal contribution Development Design Technologies Flash (AS3) Platforms Web Flash isn’t available in browsers anymore, so if you want you can download the game here and then run it with Flash Player Projector (about). Description Keep our galaxy balanced through decisions and killing! You have been chosen to be Earth’s new BioBalancer. Earth is the most powerful planet in our galaxy and your job is to protect other planets from being destroyed by attackers while managing to keep Earth’s supremacy.

item.title: Undead Parade
item.description: Studio Pharaoh Games Personal contribution Development (+) Design (-) Technologies Flash (AS3) Platforms Web Flash isn’t available in browsers anymore, so if you want you can download the game here and then run it with Flash Player Projector (about). Description Lead this brainless parade into getting new members! Bite as many humans you can to make’em join your parade Zombies are sensitive!
